topic.title: PSurfer project
topic.body:
Can you telll me what do you think about that project?
I'm making a raspberry pi based "pc" for surf the web with privacy. Actually it will support the followeing p2p "web":
Freenet
Zeronet.
Deep web
Clearnet.
Actually i'm using a phone as the cam, because i'm trying to make it handle a security cam system, so what do you think?
